title: RPG问题
author: xumihang
txt_content:
/RPGitem [物品名字] power command 0 right 获得10W金币 `eco give {player} 100000` essentials.eco` 
/RPGitem [物品名字] power command 0 right 获得10W金币 `eco give {player} 100000` essentials.eco


 这俩种我都试过了 可是玩家就是没有权限 求解答

replies.author: 红菜头糕
replies.txt_content: /RPGitem [物品名字] power command 0 right 获得10W金币 `eco give {player} 100000` *

replies.author: xumihang
replies.txt_content:
SS菜鸟君 发表于 2016-1-1 17:46
/RPGitem [物品名字] power command 0 right 获得10W金币 `eco give {player} 100000` *
试过了 不行= =

replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content:
xumihang 发表于 2016-1-1 21:24
是啊 不能
....物品名字那里你不会把[]也加了吧....
*权限的不行的话换成essentials.*....

replies.author: soal04light
replies.txt_content: 这种相当于玩家自己打指令……需要权限，不过给了权限的话，玩家就能刷钱了……用别的插件试试吧
